entry.title: Great opportunity for female and non-binary developers to have a chance at winning a Developer DAO membership 🤩
entry.summary: Great opportunity for female and non-binary developers to have a chance at winning a Developer DAO membership 🤩 D_D Women: We are excited to partner with @PhoenixGuildHQ, to onboard more female and non-binary developers into the world of solidity.✨ We will be sponsoring two @developer_dao memberships to participants who complete the bootcamp. Register here, to get started: https://lu.ma/0gs7o1kb?s=09
